name: Dunfen Isles
role_in_state: Island shipbuilding, salt & reagent transshipment node
culture_adjustments: Port-cant colored by Island Creole borrowings
Clan-led cooperative labor often supersedes guild practice
Tide-centric auguries more frequent and locally elaborate
Literacy skewed toward seamanship/accounting, less inland law
Seasonal seabird/kelp rites regulate harvest rights
constraints: limited heavy/large-hull industrialization by tech and regulation
notes: Pier-guilds enforce bonded reagent storage and access rules
Tide-augury seasons narrow safe trading windows
Salt works operate via clan-guild labor-sharing agreements
